title: News24.com | KZN man charged with attempted murder for exposing others to Covid-19
description: Police are trying to track down 27 people the man came into contact with at his salon business and also at a religious gathering he attended.
content:
A KwaZulu-Natal man, who tested positive for Covid-19 and continued with business as usual, has been charged with attempted murder, police said on Wednesday. 
Police spokesperson Brigadier Vish Naidoo said Ladysmith SAPS were investigating the matter after t… [+1707 chars]
